item.title: Using CloudFront as a Reverse Proxy
item.description: Alternate title: How to be master of your domain. The basic idea of this post is to demonstrate how CloudFront can be utilized as a serverless reverse-proxy, allowing you to host all of your application’s content and services from a single domain. This minimizes a project’s TLD footprint while providing project organization and performance along the way. Why Within large organizations, bureaucracy can make it a challenge to obtain a subdomain for a project.
